description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'NotesList' which displays a list of note items, with handling for empty state and events for selecting and deleting notes.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A LightningJS component for rendering a list of notes with UI elements and event handling.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Emits a 'select' event with the selected note to parent components.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Emits a 'delete' event with the note to parent components.
